titleStmt.title: An impartial and brief description of the plaza, or sumptuous market-place of Madrid, and the bull-baiting there together with the history of the famous and much admired Placidus : as also a large scheme : being the liverly representation of the Order of Ornament of this solemnity / by James Salgado ...
titleStmt.author: Salgado, James, fl. 1680.

biblFull.extent: [10], 46 [i.e. 38] p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill., port.
